definition: dainty
lovable/pampered/tender/delicate/frail
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]

sentences.english: Likewise, what good is it to be beautiful or handsome if one is not virtuous?
sentences.chinese: 同樣地，人嬌美或瀟灑卻沒有美德有何用？

sentences.english: Do you desire beautiful and tempting lips with high attraction?
sentences.chinese: 渴望脣色嬌美，誘惑人想一親芳澤？

sentences.english: A sweet and pretty bamboo shoots girl , the bamboo is exactly knocked for itself.
sentences.chinese: 竹筍姑娘的嬌美，恰恰是被“敲竹槓”的緣由。

sentences.english: The heavy star is more and more clean, a beautiful night of parties.
sentences.chinese: 繁星越發皎潔，一派嬌美的夜色。

sentences.english: The beautiful sunflower is still on my mind.
sentences.chinese: 嬌美向日葵，仍然記在心間。

sentences.english: The lotus offers its beauty to the heaven, the grass its service to the earth.
sentences.chinese: 菡萏向長天誇口它的嬌美，小草則緘默地侍奉土地。

sentences.english: Cecil cool, so charming the sweet-scented osmanthus in autumn withdrew earlier stage.
sentences.chinese: 絲絲涼涼，讓嬌美的桂花早些退下了秋的舞臺。

sentences.english: The vivid colors of this lotus, its petals still covered with raindrops, were absolutely beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 這朵睡蓮色彩豔麗，花瓣帶雨，嬌美非常。

definition: graceful/charming/feminine
flirtatious/coquettish/sweet and charming/beautiful young woman (old)
tender and beautiful/also written 嬌艷|娇艳
fragile/delicate
lit. hiding the moon, shaming the flowers (idiom)/fig. female beauty exceeding even that of the natural world
lit. as round as pearls and as smooth as jade (idiom)/fig. elegant and polished (of singing or writing)
light muslin/gauze
handsome/pretty
to have bright eyes and white teeth
seductive appearance/fawning manner
to blush/to flush red
clear as ice and clean as jade (idiom); spotless/irreproachable/incorruptible
lit. fish sink, goose alights (idiom, from Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子); fig. female beauty captivating even the birds and beasts
gentle and refined
lit. capable of causing the downfall of a city or state (idiom)/fig. (of a woman) devastatingly beautiful/also written 傾城傾國|倾城倾国[qing1 cheng2 qing1 guo2]
lit. capable of causing the downfall of a city or state (idiom)/fig. (of a woman) devastatingly beautiful
